instruction: Construct a vocab list for an AI-powered chatbot.
output: A vocab list for an AI-powered chatbot might include the following words: greetings (hello, hi, hey, etc.), questions (what, when, why, how, etc.), affirmations (yes, no, absolutely, sure, etc.), commands (open, close, stop, start, etc.), requests (can you please, can I, help me, etc.), and emojis. Vocab lists help the chatbot understand the user's intent and provide more accurate and natural responses.
